mapper.sql: SCHED_NAME, TRIGGER_NAME, TRIGGER_GROUP, JOB_NAME, JOB_GROUP, DESCRIPTION, NEXT_FIRE_TIME, PREV_FIRE_TIME, PRIORITY, TRIGGER_STATE, TRIGGER_TYPE, START_TIME, END_TIME, CALENDAR_NAME, MISFIRE_INSTR, JOB_DATA
mapper.select: SELECT c.TRIGGER_NAME, c.TRIGGER_GROUP, c.JOB_NAME, c.JOB_GROUP, c.DESCRIPTION, c.TRIGGER_STATE, c.START_TIME, c.END_TIME, c.NEXT_FIRE_TIME, c.PREV_FIRE_TIME, e.JOB_CLASS_NAME, d.CRON_EXPRESSION FROM qrtz_triggers c INNER JOIN qrtz_cron_triggers d ON c.TRIGGER_NAME = d.TRIGGER_NAME AND c.TRIGGER_GROUP = d.TRIGGER_GROUP INNER JOIN qrtz_job_details e ON e.JOB_NAME = c.JOB_NAME AND e.JOB_GROUP = c.JOB_GROUP;
